title: In-Place Migrations with Plone, Feels Like Magic
description:
Plone migrations are challenging by nature. There's no one size meets all approach. Add-ons and custom content can make the task feel impossible at times. However, once all the details are hammered out — and when it's all send and done — the final process can feel like magic.


Six Feet Up was tasked with migrating a Plone site from 5.1 to 5.2 on Python 3. In this case study, we discuss:
* choosing a migration method

* preparing the site and data, and
* refining the migration steps to ensure a smooth In-Place migration.


#PWC2022 attracted nearly 375 attendees from 36 countries and 21 time zones making it the biggest and best year yet. The highly engaging format featured 90 speakers, 6 tracks (including 80 talks and 4 tutorials) and took place virtually on March 21-25, 2022 on LoudSwarm by Six Feet Up.



More information about the conference can be found at: https://2022.pythonwebconf.com
